sentences: Tema on ainuke laps meie peres.
context: The word 'ainuke' is an adjective in Estonian that means 'only', 'sole', or 'single'. It indicates exclusivity - that there is only one of something. In the nominative singular form, it can be used to describe a single person or thing that stands alone without others. For example, 'ainuke laps' means 'the only child'.
